name: Turnip the Heat (Parker, The Rickness)
description:
Turnip The Heat

By Team Turnip

Your farm is being ravaged by aphids. No longer will you rely on the normal means of pest control, it's time to pull out the big guns.

Equip your high tech multi-function fertilizer and "pesticide" sprayer and protect your Turnip yield from a voracious aphid invasion.

Controls

Left Mouse: Fertilizer - Encourages plant growth, heals plants. Warning: Adverse effects can occur if applied directly to pests.

Right Mouse: Pesticide - Who are we kidding? This is highly flammable fiery death for aphids. Use with caution, may damage plants.

Directions:
  • Use the seed bag to plant your field with delicious turnips.
  • Monitor the growth of your plants and harvest when ready.
  • Aphids will likely attack. Fend them off until your plants are harvested!
  • After a complete harvest, you can sell your turnips for cash, or convert into more fertilizer and pesticide.
  • If you do not complete a harvest, and have an empty bag of turnips, you will lose.

Thanks for Playing and Rating our Vim Jam 3 submission! Please leave a comment below so we can check out your games too!
